FuncDef:
The flood proxy command configures a flood proxy IP address.
The undo flood proxy command deletes the configured flood proxy IP address. The flood proxy command configures a flood proxy IP address. The undo flood proxy command deletes the configured flood proxy IP address. By default, no flood proxy IP address is configured. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8850-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P, CE8850-HAM, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a flood proxy IP address.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.
